review: It was easy to set up and performs beyond my expectations.

review: I love the Fire TV Stick! Easy to set up. Easy to use. Amazon music and Spotify and so many of my other favorite apps and Shows!

review: Setup was very easy and we were watching movies with our daughter in no time at all. Connecting to the Internet and downloading apps is easy.

review: It's amazing, I'm really enjoying it....thank you!

review: Fairly simple but more important when i was stuck I called Aazon forhelp and they were more than helpful.

review: It's a solid product. I use it when I travel, so far it's worked in every hotel. Nice.

review: Fire stick works great, as advertized
